name: google-workspace-mcp-server
description: A production-ready MCP server providing comprehensive Google Workspace integration with Gmail, Drive, Calendar, Sheets, Slides, and Tasks through secure OAuth 2.0 authentication.

tools.name: echo
tools.description: Echo a message back to the user

tools.name: get_user_info
tools.description: Get information about the authenticated user

tools.name: roll_dice
tools.description: Roll an N-sided die

tools.name: search_gmail_emails
tools.description: Search emails using Gmail query syntax

tools.name: read_gmail_email
tools.description: Read an email by its message ID

tools.name: modify_gmail_email
tools.description: Modify email labels

tools.name: delete_gmail_email
tools.description: Delete an email by its message ID

tools.name: list_gmail_labels
tools.description: List all Gmail labels

tools.name: create_gmail_label
tools.description: Create a new Gmail label

tools.name: update_gmail_label
tools.description: Update an existing Gmail label

tools.name: delete_gmail_label
tools.description: Delete a Gmail label

tools.name: get_or_create_gmail_label
tools.description: Get an existing label or create it if it doesn't exist

tools.name: send_gmail_email
tools.description: Send an email using Gmail API with advanced options

tools.name: draft_gmail_email
tools.description: Create a draft email using Gmail API

tools.name: batch_modify_gmail_emails
tools.description: Modify multiple emails at once

tools.name: batch_delete_gmail_emails
tools.description: Delete multiple emails at once

tools.name: search_drive_files
tools.description: Search files and folders in Google Drive using query syntax

tools.name: get_drive_file_content
tools.description: Retrieve the content of a specific Google Drive file by ID

tools.name: list_drive_items
tools.description: List files and folders in a specific Google Drive folder

tools.name: create_drive_file
tools.description: Create a new file in Google Drive, with content or from a URL

tools.name: list_calendars
tools.description: List all calendars accessible to the authenticated user

tools.name: get_events
tools.description: List events from a specified Google Calendar within a time range

tools.name: create_event
tools.description: Create a new event in a Google Calendar

tools.name: modify_event
tools.description: Modify an existing event in a Google Calendar

tools.name: delete_event
tools.description: Delete an event from a Google Calendar

tools.name: get_event
tools.description: Get details of a single event by its ID from a Google Calendar

tools.name: list_spreadsheets
tools.description: List spreadsheets from Google Drive that the user has access to

tools.name: get_spreadsheet_info
tools.description: Get information about a specific spreadsheet including its sheets

tools.name: read_sheet_values
tools.description: Read values from a specific range in a Google Sheet

tools.name: modify_sheet_values
tools.description: Modify values in a specific range of a Google Sheet - can write, update, or clear values

tools.name: create_spreadsheet
tools.description: Create a new Google Spreadsheet

tools.name: create_sheet
tools.description: Create a new sheet within an existing spreadsheet

tools.name: create_presentation
tools.description: Create a new Google Slides presentation

tools.name: get_presentation
tools.description: Get details about a Google Slides presentation

tools.name: batch_update_presentation
tools.description: Apply batch updates to a Google Slides presentation

tools.name: get_page
tools.description: Get details about a specific page (slide) in a presentation

tools.name: get_page_thumbnail
tools.description: Generate a thumbnail URL for a specific page (slide) in a presentation

tools.name: list_task_lists
tools.description: List all task lists for the user

tools.name: get_task_list
tools.description: Get details of a specific task list

tools.name: create_task_list
tools.description: Create a new task list

tools.name: update_task_list
tools.description: Update an existing task list

tools.name: delete_task_list
tools.description: Delete a task list. Note: This will also delete all tasks in the list

tools.name: list_tasks
tools.description: List all tasks in a specific task list

tools.name: get_task
tools.description: Get details of a specific task

tools.name: create_task
tools.description: Create a new task in a task list

tools.name: update_task
tools.description: Update an existing task

tools.name: delete_task
tools.description: Delete a task from a task list

tools.name: move_task
tools.description: Move a task to a different position or parent within the same list, or to a different list

tools.name: clear_completed_tasks
tools.description: Clear all completed tasks from a task list. The tasks will be marked as hidden

required.name: GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID
required.description: Google OAuth 2.0 Client ID from Google Cloud Console

required.name: GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET
required.description: Google OAuth 2.0 Client Secret from Google Cloud Console

required.name: BETTER_AUTH_URL
required.description: Base URL for Better Auth (e.g., https://your-domain.com)

required.name: BETTER_AUTH_SECRET
required.description: Secret key for Better Auth session management
